channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Biden decries ICC arrest warrant request for Israeli leaders; Target cuts prices
item.description: President Biden called an arrest warrant request for Israeli leaders "outrageous." Target is lowering prices on 5,000 common products.
item.content:encoded:
President Biden called an arrest warrant request for Israeli leaders "outrageous." Target is lowering prices on 5,000 common products.

(Image credit: Anadolu)
item.dc:creator: Suzanne Nuyen

item.title: He fell ill on a cruise. Before he boarded the rescue boat, they handed him the bill
item.description: A man from Michigan was evacuated from a cruise ship after having seizures. First, he drained his bank account to pay his medical bills.
item.content:encoded:
A man from Michigan was evacuated from a cruise ship after having seizures. First, he drained his bank account to pay his medical bills.

(Image credit: Kristen Norman)
item.dc:creator: Bram Sable-Smith

item.title: Republicans try to soften stance on abortion as 'abolitionists' go farther
item.description: Activists who describe themselves as "abortion abolitionists" want to charge women who have abortions with homicide and ban the fertility treatment known as IVF, saying life begins at conception.
item.content:encoded:
Activists who describe themselves as "abortion abolitionists" want to charge women who have abortions with homicide and ban the fertility treatment known as IVF, saying life begins at conception.

(Image credit: Sarah McCammon)
item.dc:creator: Sarah McCammon

item.title: One voted Biden. One picked Trump. It's a tale of two counties in pivotal Wisconsin
item.description: Wisconsin is one of a handful of pivotal states in the 2024 presidential election. Within the swing state, there are swing counties that could decide the election — even as people remain divided.
item.content:encoded: Wisconsin is one of a handful of pivotal states in the 2024 presidential election. Within the swing state, there are swing counties that could decide the election — even as people remain divided.
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: What might have caused the helicopter crash that killed Iran's president
item.description: Bad weather may have been a cause of Sunday's crash that killed Ebrahim Raisi. But mechanical issues, possibly exacerbated by a lack of spare parts due to U.S. sanctions, could also be a factor.
item.content:encoded:
Bad weather may have been a cause of Sunday's crash that killed Ebrahim Raisi. But mechanical issues, possibly exacerbated by a lack of spare parts due to U.S. sanctions, could also be a factor.

(Image credit: Atta Kenare)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman

item.title: Mourners begin funerals for Iran's president and others killed in helicopter crash
item.description: Mourners in black began gathering Tuesday for days of funerals and processions for Iran's late president, foreign minister and others killed in a helicopter crash.
item.content:encoded: Mourners in black began gathering Tuesday for days of funerals and processions for Iran's late president, foreign minister and others killed in a helicopter crash.
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: World leaders seek unity on AI at virtual summit co-hosted by South Korea, U.K.
item.description: The Seoul summit is a follow-up to last November's summit in the U.K., where participating countries agreed to work together to contain risks posed by galloping advances in artificial intelligence.
item.content:encoded: The Seoul summit is a follow-up to last November's summit in the U.K., where participating countries agreed to work together to contain risks posed by galloping advances in artificial intelligence.
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Target is reducing prices on 5,000 common goods, including milk, butter and pet food
item.description: Target said it is trying to help customers save money as well as stay competitive in its markets. Price reductions have already been reflected in about 1,500 products.
item.content:encoded:
Target said it is trying to help customers save money as well as stay competitive in its markets. Price reductions have already been reflected in about 1,500 products.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie

item.title: Biden will name new boss soon to lead 'toxic' FDIC
item.description: FDIC chairman Martin Gruenberg says he's prepared to step down once a successor is confirmed. Gruenberg has been widely criticized for fostering a toxic workplace at the agency.
item.content:encoded:
FDIC chairman Martin Gruenberg says he's prepared to step down once a successor is confirmed. Gruenberg has been widely criticized for fostering a toxic workplace at the agency.

(Image credit: Win McNamee)
item.dc:creator: Scott Horsley

item.title: Scarlett Johansson says she is 'shocked, angered' over new ChatGPT voice
item.description: Johansson says she was approached multiple times by OpenAI to be the voice of ChatGPT, and that she declined. Then the company released a voice assistant that sounded uncannily like her.
item.content:encoded:
Johansson says she was approached multiple times by OpenAI to be the voice of ChatGPT, and that she declined. Then the company released a voice assistant that sounded uncannily like her.

(Image credit: Leon Bennett)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn
